title: Scarf, 1940–49
markings:
Printed on one side, "PATENTED  U.S.  PAT.  OFF.  BRITISH  AMERICAN  AMBULANCE CORPS  PERMIT - 10% OF ALL FABRIC  SALES  DONATED." 
Woven label sewn on, "Saks Fifth Avenue."
dimensions: 69 cm [27"]  x  63.5 cm 25"]    Fringe on all four sides.
description: Shields, crowns, eagles and flags printed in red, yellow and navy blue on white.   "BRITISH  AMERICAN  AMBULANCE  CORPS   GOOD  NEIGHBORS"  printed into the design of the scarf.
